name: Evolutionary Enigma
description:
Controls:

Movement: [WASD] or [Arrow keys]

Rotate: [Q] counterclockwise - [E] clockwise

Restart level: [R]

Description:

Evolutionary Enigma is a unique and engaging puzzle game where the player have to construct an organism by placing cells in a grid. 

The objective is to collect all the spice piles in each level while navigating through tight spaces. 

The players must use their foresight and puzzle-solving skills to carefully construct the organism in a way that will enable it to navigate through each level and collect all the spice piles.

Throughout the game, players will encounter a variety of challenges, including tight spaces that require the organism to be compact and hazards that require sacrificing parts of the organism to progress.

The 3 sub-themes we got where:
  • Paramecium
  • Malleability
  • Chili powder
